  • Method Details

    • buildAddPlayerToGameMessage

      public static LobbyMessage buildAddPlayerToGameMessage(String token, String username, boolean disconnection)
      Create a LobbyMessage object from username
      Parameters:
      token - is the user token
      username - is the username under which the user log itself in
      disconnection - tell if the user wants to disconnect
      Returns:
      the LobbyMessage object to send to the server

    • buildNumberOfPlayerMessage

      public static NumberOfPlayersMessage buildNumberOfPlayerMessage(String token, String username, int numberOfPlayers, String gameName)
      Create a NumberOfPlayersMessage
      Parameters:
      token - is the user token
      username - is the username under which the user log itself in
      numberOfPlayers - is the maximum number of players of the game
      Returns:
      the NumberOfPlayersMessage object to send to the server

      Parameters:
      p - is the player
      token - is the user token
      coordinate - is the coordinate chosen by the user
      Returns:
      the ObjectCardRequest object to send to the server
